location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 5: Lieutenant George William Leeds, Commander of the Honourable Company's Schooner Constance, to Commodore John Patterson Porter, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron

physicalDescription.extent: The right edge of this folio is missing.

mods.abstract: In this letter, which is a true copy signed by Commodore John Patterson Porter, Lieutenant George William Leeds relays intelligence received from the Agent at Sharja [Sharjah], Hadji Yacoob, which concerns recent actions carried out by some of the Arab chiefs. Many of the important details in this letter have been lost because the edge of one side of the folio is missing. A note on the verso of the folio states that this copy was originally enclosed in a letter from Porter, dated 7 April.
